description: External tools required for building and running binflate

msys2.description: MSYS2 provides Unix-like build environment for Windows

win32.manual: Pre-installed on GitHub Actions windows-2022 runners at C:/msys64

notes: Required for Windows builds to provide MinGW toolchain and Unix utilities
On GitHub Actions: Pre-installed at C:/msys64

lzfse.description: LZFSE compression library (used for all compressions)
notes: LZFSE is used for compression across all platforms (macOS, Linux, Windows)
On macOS: Uses native Apple Compression framework
On Linux/Windows: Builds automatically from lzfse git submodule
No manual installation required - handled by build system
